item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

We have a Brand new Location! 

5/16/2011's location will be:

Zafra: Cuban Restaurant and Rum Bar

Zafra is an Awesome new Rum bar that just opened up downtown.  Located on Orange Street just before the intersection with Elm, (Next to the former Christy's) this new location brings Exciting new competition to the Cuban cuisine in New Haven.  The food portions have been generous, and the various Rum based drinks are Delicious.  A couple collective members have already rated this amongst the Best Mojitos in town, and probably the best 'Dark and Stormy' I've ever had.  They have a selection of Over 100 Rums to chose from!  You can even try a "Rum Flight" if inclined, holy smokes I think anyone would "take flight" after all those options!

If it wasn't obvious, I'm excited to bring the collective to this new great location.

The Owner Dominick, has offered us the following great specials:

"Mojito Monday" featuring $5 Mojitos (House, Coconut, Mango, or Black Cherry)

$3 Bottled Imported Beer.  (I recommend Xingu, it's tasty.)

$4 Draft Beers

$7.95 Cuban Nachos  (Normally $9.95... trust me they are no joke, I ordered them after a 4 mile run and still did not manage to find the bottom of the plate!)

A.J. will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

Please RSVP for this event when able.

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

P.S. As some of you may know, Meetup does charge the Leadership twice a year for hosting the website.  We do not pass this fee along in any mandatory way, however we will be bringing a collection jar along to the next few functions and anything you can give towards defraying this cost to keeping the group going will be appreciated!  Thanks!

For more information about the Bar, please visit: www.zafrarumbar.com﻿

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***

﻿
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
item.name: Happy Hour - ZAFRA (It's a Brand New Location!)
